title: Morgan Stanley Profit Rises 9%
sub_head: Bank joins peers in posting gains in investment banking but decline in trading revenue
body:
Morgan Stanley said Wednesday that profit rose 9% in the fourth quarter to $3.7 billion.
The bank earned $2.01 per share. Analysts expected $1.94 a share, according to FactSet. Revenue rose 7% to $14.5 billion in the quarter, which fell just short of expectations.
